title: IModelDoc2.CreateCenterLineVB
description: Creates a center line from P1 to P2 and can be used in Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) and other forms of Basic that do not support SafeArrays.
signature:
void CreateCenterLineVB( 
   System.Double
X1
,
   System.Double
Y1
,
   System.Double
Z1
,
   System.Double
X2
,
   System.Double
Y2
,
   System.Double
Z2
)

remarks:
You can also create centerline construction geometry using
IModelDoc2::CreateLine2
and
ISketchSegment::ConstructionGeometry
.
